rooms.name: Living Area & Dining Room
rooms.description: Combined area for living and dining with large windows to enhance natural light following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated office space with sound insulation, north-facing window for a calm environment per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Studio Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Contemporary studio apartment designed as a duplex with flexible space to accommodate living, sleeping and a study area. Includes a central corridor.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area with ample natural light from south windows and ventilation, while adhering to Vastu principles for health.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open-air courtyard at the center of the floor plan serving as a communal gathering space and promoting natural ventilation.

openings.description: North-facing entrance designed per Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Multiple windows placed on the south and east sides to balance energy according to Vastu principles while providing ample light.
